title: Leading banks by market capitalization in Italy 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Company Name in the x axis and Market capitalization in million euros in the y axis.
Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo has the highest Market capitalization in million euros and Banca Popolare di Sondrio has the lowest Market capitalization in million euros.
The highest Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo has 37282.07 more Market capitalization in million euros than the lowest Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Company Name, and Market capitalization in million euros in each Company Name on the y axis.
The maximum Market capitalization in million euros 38043.87 is found at Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo and the minimum is found at Banca Popolare di Sondrio where Company Name is 761.8.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company Name in the x axis and Market capitalization in million euros in the y axis.
Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo has the highest Market capitalization in million euros and Banca Popolare di Sondrio has the lowest Market capitalization in million euros.
The highest Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo has 37282.07 more Market capitalization in million euros than the lowest Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market capitalization in million euros for 10 number of Company Names.
Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo has the highest Market capitalization in million euros and Banca Popolare di Sondrio has the lowest Market capitalization in million euros.
Company Name UniCredit has the second highest value for Market capitalization in million euros.
The highest Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo has 37282.07 more Market capitalization in million euros than the lowest Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio.
The Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo has the highest Market capitalization in million euros, followed by UniCredit, and Mediobanca. Down to the Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio which is the lowest.
The highest value 38043.87 at Intesa Sanpaolo is almost 4.28 times larger than the average value 8890.39.
The Market capitalization in million euros is 88903.91 if we add up values of all Company Names.
